experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: Project Topic :- Concept of Consultancy & Engineering Services For Opencast Mine Planning. •Analyzed & formulated the mining report covering feasibility, profitability & environmental hazards for an open cast mining project.•Incorporated ArcGis, surpac, and Autocad for better visualization of actual mining scenarios helping in better quantitative decisions.•Created site maps, performed locational and spatial analysis & managed the geographical data using cloud based ArcGis software.

experience.title: Member
experience.description: •Led a three-tier team, managing 2 events during the adventure weekend that witnessed a footfall of over 300 students.•Successfully conducted rappelling and zipline adventure events for around 200+ students in IIT Kharagpur campus.•Coordinated and delivered the presentation during the introductory seminar attended by more than 800 students.
